languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, если пожелаете, чтобы я в ваше будущее повнимательнее заглянула, найдите меня на мостике, потолкуем. Леди Теодоре мои шепотки не раз добрую службу сослужили, уверена, и вам пригодятся". {n}Обкусанные губы псайкера расплываются в кривоватой улыбке.{/n}

"Lord Captain, if you want me to take a closer look into your future, find me on the bridge and we can talk. Lady Theodora was well served by my whispers on many occasions, and I'm sure you would benefit from them as well." {n}The psyker's bitten lips stretch into a wry smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, если пожелаете, чтобы я в ваше будущее повнимательнее заглянула, найдите меня на мостике, потолкуем. Леди Теодоре мои шепотки не раз добрую службу сослужили, уверена, и вам пригодятся". {n}Обкусанные губы псайкера расплываются в кривоватой улыбке.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, if you want me to take a closer look into your future, find me on the bridge and we can talk. Lady Theodora was well served by my whispers on many occasions, and I'm sure you would benefit from them as well." {n}The psyker's bitten lips stretch into a wry smile.{/n}

"Lord Captain, if you want me to take a closer look into your future, find me on the bridge and we can talk. Lady Theodora was well served by my whispers on many occasions, and I'm sure you would benefit from them as well." {n}The psyker's bitten lips stretch into a wry smile.{/n}

"Lord Captain, if you want me to take a closer look into your future, find me on the bridge and we can talk. Lady Theodora was well served by my whispers on many occasions, and I'm sure you would benefit from them as well." {n}The psyker's bitten lips stretch into a wry smile.{/n}

"Lord Captain, if you want me to take a closer look into your future, find me on the bridge and we can talk. Lady Theodora was well served by my whispers on many occasions, and I'm sure you would benefit from them as well." {n}The psyker's bitten lips stretch into a wry smile.{/n}

languages.text: “舰长大人，如果你打算让我看看你的未来，你可以来舰桥上找我，到时候我们可以谈谈。我耳中听到的低语为西奥多拉夫人带来了很多好处，我相信你也能从中获益。”{n}伊迪拉紧紧咬着嘴唇，露出了扭曲的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if you want me to take a closer look into your future, find me on the bridge and we can talk. Lady Theodora was well served by my whispers on many occasions, and I'm sure you would benefit from them as well." {n}The psyker's bitten lips stretch into a wry smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，如果你打算让我看看你的未来，你可以来舰桥上找我，到时候我们可以谈谈。我耳中听到的低语为西奥多拉夫人带来了很多好处，我相信你也能从中获益。”{n}伊迪拉紧紧咬着嘴唇，露出了扭曲的微笑。{/n}

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, si vous voulez en savoir davantage sur votre avenir, vous me trouverez sur le pont. Dame Théodora elle-même s'est reposée sur mes murmures à plus d'une occasion, et je suis certaine qu'ils pourront également vous être utiles, » {n}ajoute la psyker avec un sourire en coin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if you want me to take a closer look into your future, find me on the bridge and we can talk. Lady Theodora was well served by my whispers on many occasions, and I'm sure you would benefit from them as well." {n}The psyker's bitten lips stretch into a wry smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, si vous voulez en savoir davantage sur votre avenir, vous me trouverez sur le pont. Dame Théodora elle-même s'est reposée sur mes murmures à plus d'une occasion, et je suis certaine qu'ils pourront également vous être utiles, » {n}ajoute la psyker avec un sourire en coin.{/n}

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, si quiere que estudie su futuro, búsqueme en el puente. Lady Theodora se benefició en numerosas ocasiones de mis susurros y seguramente le sean útiles también a usted». {n}Los labios mordidos de la psíquica forman una sonrisa irónica.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if you want me to take a closer look into your future, find me on the bridge and we can talk. Lady Theodora was well served by my whispers on many occasions, and I'm sure you would benefit from them as well." {n}The psyker's bitten lips stretch into a wry smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, si quiere que estudie su futuro, búsqueme en el puente. Lady Theodora se benefició en numerosas ocasiones de mis susurros y seguramente le sean útiles también a usted». {n}Los labios mordidos de la psíquica forman una sonrisa irónica.{/n}

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、あなたの未来について知りたければ、橋の上で会って、話しましょう。シオドーラ様は何度も私の囁きに助けらています。きっと、お役に立つかと」{n}唇を噛みしめていた異能者は、不敵な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if you want me to take a closer look into your future, find me on the bridge and we can talk. Lady Theodora was well served by my whispers on many occasions, and I'm sure you would benefit from them as well." {n}The psyker's bitten lips stretch into a wry smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、あなたの未来について知りたければ、橋の上で会って、話しましょう。シオドーラ様は何度も私の囁きに助けらています。きっと、お役に立つかと」{n}唇を噛みしめていた異能者は、不敵な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Captain, wenn Ihr möchtet, dass ich Eure Zukunft genauer betrachte, sprecht mich auf der Brücke an. Meine Flüsterer haben Lady Theodora oft gute Dienste erwiesen, und ich bin sicher, auch Ihr könntet von ihnen profitieren." {n}Die zerbissenen Lippen der Psionikerin verziehen sich zu einem trockenen Grinsen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if you want me to take a closer look into your future, find me on the bridge and we can talk. Lady Theodora was well served by my whispers on many occasions, and I'm sure you would benefit from them as well." {n}The psyker's bitten lips stretch into a wry smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, wenn Ihr möchtet, dass ich Eure Zukunft genauer betrachte, sprecht mich auf der Brücke an. Meine Flüsterer haben Lady Theodora oft gute Dienste erwiesen, und ich bin sicher, auch Ihr könntet von ihnen profitieren." {n}Die zerbissenen Lippen der Psionikerin verziehen sich zu einem trockenen Grinsen.{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, geleceğine göz atmamı istersen köprüde beni bul, konuşalım. Leydi Theodora, fısıltılarımın pek çok kez faydasını gördü. Şimdi de yararı olacağından eminim." {n}Ruhsezerin ısırdığı dudakları, çarpık bir gülümsemeyle bükülüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, if you want me to take a closer look into your future, find me on the bridge and we can talk. Lady Theodora was well served by my whispers on many occasions, and I'm sure you would benefit from them as well." {n}The psyker's bitten lips stretch into a wry smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, geleceğine göz atmamı istersen köprüde beni bul, konuşalım. Leydi Theodora, fısıltılarımın pek çok kez faydasını gördü. Şimdi de yararı olacağından eminim." {n}Ruhsezer'in ısırdığı dudakları, çarpık bir gülümsemeyle bükülüyor.{/n}
